descriptors.name: wellbeing
descriptors.description: Descriptors related to the user's mental and emotional state, including stress, energy, and overall wellbeing.

descriptors.name: parental
descriptors.description: Descriptors related to parental or caring responsibilities.

descriptors.name: religious
descriptors.description: Descriptors related to religious practices, beliefs, or related needs such as dietary or prayer requirements.

descriptors.name: disability
descriptors.description: Descriptors that capture the impact of a disability or long-term condition on the user, including accessibility and health needs.

descriptors.name: colleagueSharing
descriptors.description: Descriptors regarding the type and level of information the user is comfortable sharing with colleagues.

descriptors.name: employerSupport
descriptors.description: Descriptors regarding the user's support and communication preferences from the employer.

descriptors.name: personalIntroduction
descriptors.description: Descriptors for personal introduction details that capture background, hobbies, ambitions, and other personal insights.
